title: 'Halo 5' to be played on world's biggest aerial screen in the sky
text:
'Halo 5' to be played on world's biggest aerial screen in the sky 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
One of the biggest games of the year, Halo 5: Guardians, is getting a fitting grand entrance in Australia before it launches globally on Oct... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
